tags.name: ef-rating
tags.description: Star visualisation component that is generally used for ranking

attributes.name: interactive
attributes.description: Make it possible to interact with rating control and change the value

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Set number of selected stars. Value can be any number between 0 and `max`.
Decimal values are calculated to empty star (0 - .25); half-star (.25 - .75) and full star (.75 - 1)

properties.name: interactive
properties.description: Make it possible to interact with rating control and change the value

properties.name: value
properties.description:
Set number of selected stars. Value can be any number between 0 and `max`.
Decimal values are calculated to empty star (0 - .25); half-star (.25 - .75) and full star (.75 - 1)
